page.description: Append cells in first available empty space in sheet. Values are specified as crlf delimited rows of delimited cells. Separator defines the delimiter, which is assumed to be a comma if ommitted.
page.prototype: AppendSheetText as L(sheetname as C,values as C[, separator as C[, range as C]])

argument.name: sheetname
argument.description: Name of sheet to append text data to.

argument.name: range
argument.description: Optional range, if we don't want to use the first column, and last unused row.

page.example: dim gs as helper::GoogleSheet gs.namedresource= "<namedresource>" gs.spreadsheet= "<spreadsheetid>" gs.AppendSheetText("customers","billy|kid","|")
